channel.title: Ideas for tuts (not sure if it is in the right spot if not plz move it)
channel.description:
Hey guys Weapon here giving away some ideas that I have thought about the last couple of weeks that I have been playing Moparscape (kudos to all of you that have made a server). If u got some ideas let us know we could make it better or create a server with all of our ideas :D . Some ideas that I had include.
1. The lake around the chaos temple in wildy spits fire at you. 2. Randoms (like golem evil chicken or the shades) 3. Working fight caves ( a work in progress )* 4. [u]All[/u] quests (if thats too much then half) 5. Monsters drop items that they drop in game. And finally 6. All the shopkeepers and/or npc talk in the game
*Fight CAVES not pits
Thats all the ideas I got for now.

@Weapon wrote:

Hey guys Weapon here giving away some ideas that I have thought about the last couple of weeks that I have been playing Moparscape (kudos to all of you that have made a server). If u got some ideas let us know we could make it better or create a server with all of our ideas . Some ideas that I had include.

  1. The lake around the chaos temple in wildy spits fire at you.
  2. Randoms (like golem evil chicken or the shades)
  3. Working fight caves ( a work in progress )*
  4. All quests (if thats too much then half)
  5. Monsters drop items that they drop in game.
    And finally

*Fight CAVES not pits

Thats all the ideas I got for now.
